languages.text:
"Жизнь без интриг, что блюдо без приправ —
Безвкусна и пророчит лишь тоску.
Доверься мне, его ты не упустишь".

traits.locale_text:
"Жизнь без интриг, что блюдо без приправ —
Безвкусна и пророчит лишь тоску.
Доверься мне, его ты не упустишь".
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"Poor show! The spice of life is mystery,
Too bland a spread would sour your appetite,
The sign of mine, fear not, you'll clearly see."
languages.original_text:
"Жизнь без интриг, что блюдо без приправ —
Безвкусна и пророчит лишь тоску.
Доверься мне, его ты не упустишь".

traits.locale_text:
"Poor show! The spice of life is mystery,
Too bland a spread would sour your appetite,

traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
“无聊的演出！秘密才是生活的调味料，
过于平淡的话语，会让人兴致寥寥。
至于我的信号，无需害怕，你会清楚看到。”
languages.original_text:
"Poor show! The spice of life is mystery,
Too bland a spread would sour your appetite,
The sign of mine, fear not, you'll clearly see."

traits.locale_text:
“无聊的演出！秘密才是生活的调味料，
过于平淡的话语，会让人兴致寥寥。
至于我的信号，无需害怕，你会清楚看到。”
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
«¡Triste espectáculo! La esencia de la vida es el misterio
y su ausencia y disipación arruinará tu entretenimiento.
La señal de mi mano, sin duda, identificarás con éxito».
languages.original_text:
"Poor show! The spice of life is mystery,
Too bland a spread would sour your appetite,
The sign of mine, fear not, you'll clearly see."

traits.locale_text:
«¡Triste espectáculo! La esencia de la vida es el misterio
y su ausencia y disipación arruinará tu entretenimiento.
La señal de mi mano, sin duda, identificarás con éxito».
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
「酷いショーだ！人生のスパイスは謎であり
あまりに淡白な食事は君の食欲を減退させる
恐れるな、僕の兆しは明らかだ」
languages.original_text:
"Poor show! The spice of life is mystery,
Too bland a spread would sour your appetite,
The sign of mine, fear not, you'll clearly see."

traits.locale_text:
「酷いショーだ！人生のスパイスは謎であり
あまりに淡白な食事は君の食欲を減退させる
恐れるな、僕の兆しは明らかだ」
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"Bah! Geheimnis gibt Würze dem Leben.
Zu fad und es vergeht der Appetit.
Meines wird Würze auch Eurem geben."
languages.original_text:
"Poor show! The spice of life is mystery,
Too bland a spread would sour your appetite,
The sign of mine, fear not, you'll clearly see."

traits.locale_text:
"Bah! Geheimnis gibt Würze dem Leben.
Zu fad und es vergeht der Appetit.
Meines wird Würze auch Eurem geben."
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
« Quel spectacle désastreux !
Le mystère est le sel de la vie,
S'en passer gâcherait votre appétit.
N'ayez crainte, mon signe vous sautera aux yeux. »
languages.original_text:
"Poor show! The spice of life is mystery,
Too bland a spread would sour your appetite,
The sign of mine, fear not, you'll clearly see."

traits.locale_text:
« Quel spectacle désastreux !
Le mystère est le sel de la vie,
S'en passer gâcherait votre appétit.
N'ayez crainte, mon signe vous sautera aux yeux. »
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text:
"Kötü gösteri! Hayatın tadı tuzu gizemdir,
Lezzetine önem vermezsen iştahın kaçıverir.
Korkma, işaret benimdir. Gözlerine muhakkak ilişecektir."
languages.original_text:
"Poor show! The spice of life is mystery,
Too bland a spread would sour your appetite,
The sign of mine, fear not, you'll clearly see."

traits.locale_text:
"Kötü gösteri! Hayatın tadı tuzu gizemdir,
Lezzetine önem vermezsen iştahın kaçıverir.
Korkma, işaret benimdir. Gözlerine muhakkak ki ilişecektir."
traits.speaker: Zanni
